verses.verse: Now the Philistines<WH6430> gathered together<WH622> their armies<WH4264> to battle<WH4421>, and were gathered together<WH622> at Shochoh<WH7755>, which belongeth to Judah<WH3063>, and pitched<WH2583> between Shochoh<WH7755> and Azekah<WH5825>, in Ephes-dammim<WH658>.
